Name: Kedama's Adventure
About the game: This is a fan game based on Touhou Project, in which the protagonist, Kedama, is just a nobody in the inferior of Gensokyo, proceeding for rescuing their friends. Kedama doesn’t own any ability of remote attack but their perseverance and magic movement make themself face challenges on the way and explore the world of Gensokyo. Plots: There is no ifs and buts that can stop one rescuing their friends! No dialog but through the perspective of Kedama and the funny mini-animation, you can easily realize what have happened in the Gensokyo world. Initial Controls: ↑ ↓ ← →: move C key: attack X key: jump Z key: dash (no invincibility) Tips: 1. Press F1 to make the pop-up bar come up and then click the setting where you can change the controls. 2. Attack combos need to be discovered. Characteristics: 1. Classic 2D pixel AVG. 2. Easy to master. 3. Two different difficulty levels (EASY & HARD)for you to challenge. 4. Five continents separately presenting the various world of Gensokyo. 5. Cute animation style and funny story line, which must will make you enjoy.
